tool_description: CNAPS Codes are Chinese Banks Codes used for identifing China Bank Branch. CNAPS Codes are 12 digits Numbers allotted to each Bank Branch. CNAPS Codes are used to transfer domestic & international payments from & to chinese Bank Accounts. CNAPS codes are also called Clearing Codes or routing numbers or sort codes.
title: CNAPS Code Verification API

api_list.name: CNAPS Code Verification
api_list.description: Find Chinese Banks Branch Information by CNAPS Codes.
